description:
The Hero Came Back: The trio went to the Candy Town Cinema to greet Tam, a Butter-flavored cat Zooble who recently came back from his trip in another town. Tam himself showed to the trio his skills and admitted that he fought a lot of enemies in the city he once visited. But when a real monster came, will it be enough for him to be called a hero when he`s not to begin with?
Arl`s Tea Party: Chevy was invited to a Tea Party hosted by Arl, a Green tea-flavored bear Zooble. She herself isn`t usually used to tea parties until her friends convinced her otherwise. But this would go from better to worse for Chevy after an unlucky chain of events.

titles.title: Kaette Kita Hero / Arl no Tea Party
The Hero Came Back / Arl`s Tea Party
帰ってきたヒーロー / アールのティーパーティー
